recipe.title: Sparkling Apple Cocktail
ingredients: 4 to 5 red or green apple chunks
instructions: Combine the apple juice, cognac, simple syrup, and apple chunks in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and pour into a cocktail glass. Add additional ice, if needed. Top off with champagne. Stir and serve.
